ProjectTitle: Acid-weathered soils as a basis for slow-release nitrate fertilizers to enhance the nitrogen use efficiency in tropical crop production systems
InitialFeedbackHistory:
06/01/2025
Data: Will you use samples or materials? Please note that these are considered physical data in the context of a DMP, also list these in the table and describe how you document, store, preserve and, if possible, share them. 
Storage: The new storage guidelines of the ICTS recommend not to use OneDrive for research data, since you use the J drive for preservation it would be more secure to also store your active data on the J drive, for more information see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: Please note that a persistent identifier will be added to your datasets when you deposit them in a data repository such as RDR. This identifier allows you to link your dataset in your publications and ensures that your dataset is findable
label: good with suggestions
